trans-unit.source: Emulates a Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Data Environment" /> in applications that have been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 在已經從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級的應用程式中模擬 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Data Environment" />。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, data-bound forms were automatically created when you dragged database elements from a `Data Environment` onto a form.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，資料繫結表單時自動建立拖曳資料庫項目從`Data Environment`拖曳至表單。

trans-unit.source: The `Data Environment` handled all the mapping between Visual Basic 6.0 and the ADO data layer.
trans-unit.target: `Data Environment`處理 Visual Basic 6.0 及 ADO 資料層之間的所有對應。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`是用來讓 ADO 相關程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`是用來讓 ADO 相關程式碼。

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 無。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法尚未在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 類別中實作。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法尚未在 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment> 類別中實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects for use in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 物件的集合，以便在升級自 Visual Basic 6.0 的應用程式中使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects for use in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 物件的集合，以便在升級自 Visual Basic 6.0 的應用程式中使用。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`是用來讓 ADO 相關程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Variant" /> that contains the <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Variant" />，其中包含 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 物件。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Variant" /> that contains the <see langword="ADODB.Connection" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Variant" />，其中包含 <see langword="ADODB.Connection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="ADODB.Connection" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`是用來讓 ADO 相關程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為具有方法`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`disposing 參數設為`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: 當處置參數是`true`，這個方法會釋放任何參考這個控制項的 managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`是用來讓 ADO 相關程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains an <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，其中包含 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A GUID representing an <see langword="ADODB.Recordset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: GUID，表示 <see langword="ADODB.Recordset" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a method based on an <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 物件，叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`是用來讓 ADO 相關程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a count of <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="ADODB.Command" /> 物件的計數。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that contains the count.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Integer" />，包含計數。

trans-unit.source: Only `ADODB.Command` objects that do not return an `ADODB.Recordset` are counted.
trans-unit.target: 只有`ADODB.Command`物件不會傳回`ADODB.Recordset`計算。

trans-unit.source: When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BaseDataEnvironment`是用來讓 ADO 相關程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 不適用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法尚未在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseDataEnvironment" /> 類別中實作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Nothing" />.
